verbose_text: Even though there are differences between the classically circulating monocytes and tissue macrophages, for the purpose of our study we have grouped cells derived from BM as monocytic myeloid cells and gated in flow cytometry as Ly6G lo CD11b hi, which can be further divided into mo/mPhi and moDCs phenotypically and functionally (e.g., increased expression of MHC-II, increased motility and more potent stimulation of CD4 + and CD8 + T cells).
